title: PlayStation Showcase Happening Before Summer Game Fest?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.03.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of
polarized sunglasses.

Go to https://www.evildeadrisemovie.com/ to get your tickets NOW to see Evil Dead Rise in theaters April 21.

Greg and Blessing talk about Jeff Grubb's Game Mess Calendar, Konami opens a new studio, and Star Wars Jedi Survivor previews!
